entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 8:11 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
